subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Nets announced Monday that they had hired Kiki Vandeweghe to become a special assistant to Rod Thorn and Vandeweghe could eventually become the team’s next general manager.
snippet: The Nets announced Monday that they had hired Kiki Vandeweghe to become a special assistant to Rod Thorn and Vandeweghe could eventually become the team’s next general manager.
